Kufakwe isigaba esingavumelekile. Ngicela ubuyele emuva.

Write the root password to be set. Don't: Bhala iphasiwedi yempande ezosethwa. Ungakhathazeki; iphasiwedi ikhonjiswa njengezinkanyezi.
Enable \"Change Root Password\" to use t: Nika amandla "Shintsha Iphasiwedi Yomsuka" ukusebenzisa le nketho. Ngicela ubuyele emuva.
Write a remote debugger port. It must be: Bhala imbobo yokulungisa iphutha ekude. Kufanele kube inombolo, futhi akumele isetshenziswe vele. Ngaphandle kwalokho, i-debugger eyihlane izokwehluleka ukuvula itheku.
Write the default remote debug nickname: Bhala isiqalo sesidlaliso sokulungisa iphutha sokuzenzakalelayo.
Write how many times the \"get\" command: Bhala ukuthi umyalo "uthole" kangaki okufanele uphinde uzame ukulanda okuhlulekile. Kufanele kube inombolo.
Write when to launch screensaver after s: Bhala ukuthi uzosethula nini isibuko sesikrini ngemuva kwama-millisecond acacisiwe. Kufanele kube inombolo.
Write how many bytes can the debug log s: Bhala ukuthi mangaki ama-byte angalungiswa esitolo se-log debug. Kufanele kube inombolo.
The answer is invalid. Check to make sur: Impendulo ayivumelekile. Bheka ukuze uqiniseke ukuthi impendulo inezinombolo kokufakiwe kokulungiselela okudinga izinombolo njengezimpendulo.
Write any text you want shown. Shorter i: Bhala noma yimuphi umbhalo ofuna ukuboniswa. Okufushane kungcono.

Triggers maintenance mode. This disables: Ibangela imodi yesondlo. Lokhu kukhubaza ama-akhawunti amaningi.

You may not have inxi installed on your: Ungahle ungafaki i-inxi kusistimu yakho. Bheka umphathi wakho wephakeji ukufakwa. Ngezinhlelo ze-Debian (kanye nezisuswayo), ungahle uthande ukusebenzisa i- "sudo apt install inxi libcpanel-json-xs-perl" ku-emulator yokugcina.
Can't get information about nonexistent: Ayikwazi ukuthola ulwazi mayelana nefayela elingekho.

Enter file paths to attachments. Press E: Faka izindlela zamafayela kokunamathiselwe kwi-imeyili. Cindezela u-ENTER endleleni engenalutho ukuze uqinisekise.
Asks you to fill the required fields to: Ikucela ukuthi ugcwalise izinkambu ezidingekayo ukuze uthumele umlayezo obethelwe ekhelini

Please use \"ftp\" if you are going to u: Sicela usebenzise i- "ftp" uma uzolayisha amafayela kuseva ye-FTP.

The specified line number may not be lar: Inombolo yomugqa ecacisiwe kungenzeka ingabi nkulu kunenombolo yokugcina yomugqa wefayela.
Activates 255 color support for Dissolve: Yenza kusebenze ukwesekwa kombala okungama-255 kwe-Dissolve.
Activates true color support for Dissolv: Yenza kusebenze ukwesekwa kombala kweqiniso kwe-Dissolve.

This section lists all general kernel se: Lesi sigaba sibala zonke izilungiselelo ze-kernel ezijwayelekile, ikakhulukazi zokugcina i-kernel.
This section changes hardware probe beha: Lesi sigaba sishintsha ukusebenza kwe-hardware probe.
This section represents the login settin: Lesi sigaba simele izilungiselelo zokungena ngemvume. Phuma ku-akhawunti yakho ukuze ushintsho luqale ukusebenza.
This section lists the network settings,: Lesi sigaba sibala izilungiselelo zenethiwekhi, njengegobolondo le-FTP, amasethingi womyalo ohlobene nenethiwekhi, nezilungiselelo zokususa iphutha kude.
This section lists all the screensavers: Lesi sigaba sibala wonke ama-screensavers nezilungiselelo zawo ezitholakalayo.
Settings that don't fit in their appropr: Izilungiselelo ezingalingani ezigabeni zazo ezifanele zihlala lapha.
